attributes.action: declare the social services (incapacity/crisis loans,income support)unfit for purpose
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: it should not take four days to get through to the new help lines and they should all be free,nor should the people of the uk be made to wait 8 weeks or more to have a decision on their claim and being forced to go hungry and worry about being evicted due to the fact that the benefit office has not got round to sorting out peoples claims fast enough.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/childcare/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
